title: Giving Back the Flower Contrast Jewels and Lace

content.question: The contrast between the speaker’s description of herself as “a woman in jewels and lace” (line 14) and the description of “children crying for bread and fire” (line 16) primarily serves to emphasize the

choices.label: speaker’s belief in her own superiority
relative triviality of the speaker’s situation

content.answer: relative triviality of the speaker’s situation

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain the function of contrasting characters.
